data.name: Conqueror's Blade
data.detailed_description:
Pre-Purchase for Founder Packs now available!


Greetings, Generals!

The Conqueror's Blade Founder Packs are now available for pre-purchase on Steam! Invest in one of our Founder Packs to receive access to our Beta tests, Early Access to the game before it launches and many exclusive ingame items and bonuses.

Purchasing one of our Founder Pack Editions grants you:


CBT Access (Guaranteed access to the Closed Beta Testing, starting in October)
Early Access (Start playing before the official start date of the Open Beta Test)
Premium Account (Gain experience faster and unlock a number of other privileges)
... and many more bonuses!

You can find the details on the different editions in the section below. We are looking forward to welcoming you in Conqueror's Blade!

Note: Please be aware that the Steam Founder Pack Editions grant access to the Steam version of Conqueror's Blade only. There may be differences in available Beta Tests between the Steam and the non-Steam version of the game. Founder packs that have been purchased on the My.com website cannot be transferred to Steam or vice versa. Please get in touch with our Support team in case you have any questions regarding this.


Pre-Purchase editions

Conqueror's Blade - Explorer's Edition

Exclusive access and in-game items, available at an attractive price! Includes a unique Samurai armor for your general!

This Founder Pack grants you these exclusive Founder bonuses:


  • CBT Access (Guaranteed access to the Closed Beta Testing, starting from October)
  • 3 days early access (Start playing 3 days before the official start date of the Open Beta Test)
  • 7 days Premium Account (Gain experience faster and unlock a number of other privileges)
  • Authentic Hair Style (Get an additional shade of hair color when creating a character)
  • Unique "Explorer" Title (A unique title for the first players to fight for Conqueror's Blade)
  • Explorer's Kit (Contains 3 boxes, each containing a devastating siege weapon for use on the battlefield)

Additionally, you will receive these exclusive contents:



Join the ranks of medieval Japan's military elite with this ornate armor that's suitable for any class. Only available with a Founder Pack.




Conqueror's Blade - Adventurer's Edition


A full week of early access, valuable battlefield resources, and a unique Samurai kit!

This Founder Pack grants you these exclusive Founder bonuses:


  • CBT Access (Guaranteed access to the Closed Beta Testing, starting from October)
  • 7 days Early Access (Start playing 7 days before the official start date of the Open Beta Test)
  • 30 days Premium Account (Gain experience faster and unlock a number of other privileges)
  • Authentic Hair Style (Get an additional shade of hair color when creating a character)
  • Unique "Adventurer" Title (A unique title for the first players to fight for Conqueror's Blade)
  • Adventurer's Kit (Contains 5 boxes, each containing a devastating siege weapon for use on the battlefield)
  • Crafting Resource Kit (Contains materials to craft a complete set of weapons and armor for level 10, allowing you to save precious time. Get a head start on the competition!)

Additionally, you will receive these exclusive contents:



Join the ranks of medieval Japan's military elite with this ornate armor that's suitable for any class. Only available with a Founder Pack.

Decorative horse armor in the best traditions of the noble Samurai class.


Lead your units into battle under this intimidating banner.




Equip your soldiers with this decorative armor set and turn them into the elite Japanese detachment, ready to accompany you into the most dangerous battles. Can be used by any melee unit. Only available with a Founder Pack.




Conqueror's Blade - Conqueror's Edition


Get exclusive items and start playing before everyone else!

This Founder Pack grants you these exclusive Founder bonuses:


  • CBT Access (Guaranteed access to the Closed Beta Testing starting from October)
  • 7 days Early Access (Start playing 7 days before the official start date of the Open Beta Test)
  • 60 days Premium Account (Gain experience faster and unlock a number of other privileges)
  • Authentic Hair Style (Get an additional shade of hair color when creating a character)
  • Unique "Conqueror" Title (A unique title for the first players to fight for Conqueror's Blade)
  • Conqueror's Kit (Contains 8 boxes, each containing a devastating siege weapon for use on the battlefield)
  • Crafting Resource Kit (Contains materials to craft a complete set of weapons and armor for level 10, allowing you to save precious time. Get a head start on the competition!)

Additionally, you will receive these exclusive contents:



Join the ranks of medieval Japan's military elite with this ornate armor and decorative horse armor and lead your units into battle under this intimidating banner. Only available with a Founder Pack.


Equip your soldiers with this decorative armor set and turn them into the elite Japanese detachment, ready to accompany you into the most dangerous battles. Can be used by any melee unit. Only available with a Founder Pack.


Become a formidable commander of the Order of the Knights Templar with this unique decorative armor. Only available with a Founder Pack.


The decorative horse skin will complete your image of the invincible Templar.


The unique Templar troop flag for real conquerors!



In this decorative armor set, your elite Templar squad of heavily-armored battle knights will surely break the spirit of any opponent. Can be used by any cavalry unit. Only available with a Founder Pack.


About the Game


Lead your armies in the conquest of a persistent open world in this spectacular free-to-play multiplayer game of action and tactics, one that seamlessly combines visceral medieval combat with immersive tactical command over the men and machinery of war.

Conqueror’s Blade’s innovative hybrid of action and tactical gameplay challenges players with becoming the ultimate war general by forming alliances with other leaders, equip period-accurate armor and field iconic units from both Western and Eastern civilizations such as the Swiss Halberdiers, Iron Buddhas, Mongol mounted archers and Samurai.



Select one of the many classes and dive into the heat of battle to tip the scales of the war in your favor! Use the pros of each class to their fullest and gain an advantage over your opponents. Players choose from ten commanders, each with their own fighting style and weaponry. Can a Japanese nodachi withstand a clash against a Swiss halberd, and will be a Hospitaller’s lance be swift enough to charge a recurved Mongol bow? Answers to centuries-old questions will be finally settled on the field of battle.



Form your own armies from the world's best units. Bring your cavalry down upon the enemy! Unleash heavy armored warriors! Make your call! Units' special abilities and various formations allow for unlimited tactical maneuvers! The players are the vanguard; personally, protecting the battering rams while under fire from death-dealing arrows - all while looking to exploit an overextended enemy and secure the choke points required to emerge victorious.



Take part in massive fortress sieges. Pick the perfect moment to unleash heavy siege weapons, smash the enemy's defenses, and win! With commanders perched at ramparts and enormous trebuchets hurling burning boulders at the battling armies, Conqueror’s Blade delivers unforgettable battlescapes and a visceral medieval combat experience. With more than 1000 units charging the enemy at the same time, 30 commanders and their wisely chosen, battle-hardened troops will face off in attempts to outmaneuver the opposition.



Form valuable alliances, crush the enemy, and extend your influence all over the world. Players explore the fictional, mysterious heart-shaped continent for as far as their army can take them -- and where skirmishes over resources are inevitable. A key task for player guilds is how to organize their commanders and cooperatively plot to conquer each region, all while building and upgrading infrastructure and recruiting for the armies that will protect the spoils of war.



Go on to become, not only the greatest general, but a great ruler! Turn your castle into an impregnable bastion at the heart of your kingdom.



Kingdoms will wither and die without healthy trade, so set up your economy with an eye on the markets and diplomatic options open: it makes all the difference between a house and an empire! Trade coins and items at the Auction House, buy basic equipment from Merchants, or take risks on the Black Market to sell off rare materials for silver or gold.

data.short_description: Conqueror's Blade is a new free-to-play MMO tactical medieval warfare game. An ambitious hybrid of military strategy and deeply tactical third-person gameplay. Become the warlord of the greatest medieval civilization!
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
data.reviews:
“Conqueror's Blade impressed us with its massive battles”
https://www.gamekult.com/jeux/conqueror-s-blade-3050879149/test.html

“Good mix of combat and strategy”
http://www.computerbild.de/artikel/cbs-News-PC-Conquerors-Blade-Preview-22150145.html

“...fun as all heck.”
https://www.mmobomb.com/features/clash-swords-hands-military-mash-conquerors-blade/

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/10 - 64bit Only
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 4-Core Processor and above
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce GTX 750 / AMD Radeon R9 270 +
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/10 - 64bit Only
  • Processor: Intel I7 4-Core Processor 3.0GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 or AMD Radeon RX 480
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 11 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
